3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Umm Salamah said:"A woman asked the Prophet (ﷺ): 'I suffer from Istihadah and I never become pure; should I stop praying?' He said: 'No. Stop praying for the number of days and nights that you used to menstruate, then perform Ghusl, wrap a cloth around yourself, and pray

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَرْأَةِ يَكُونُ لَهَا أَيَّامٌ مَعْلُومَةٌ تَحِيضُهَا كُلَّ شَهْرٍ
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Who Has Regular Days During Which She Menstruates Each Month
